Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was driving south to pick my daughter up from work. it was a clear night and as i drove closer to the city area i saw a bright orange\yellow fireball type object "blink" for a few moments off to the left of me in the sky. i was wishing someone was there to witness it with me for validation but at the same time was not surprised to see it, i felt it was driven by some intelligence by the way it was "flying" and by the "flash" it gave as if acknowledging my presence or my attention to it. earlier the same night at approximately 8:00 pm i was driving home after dinner and saw a series of 3 lights in the northwestern sky blinking at different times flying in a trinangular formation. one would blink then the next then the next and so on,at first it looked like plane lights but i doubted it once i saw the "order" in the way they were blinking and the way they flew at equal distance to one another. i lost sight of the objects or object through the trees, and got a bit turned around in my neighborhood trying to follow the lights. i wasnt amazed or blown away either time, i felt validated somehow as if expecting to see them. hard to explain but i didnt react the way i thought i would....
Summary: Large fireball orange/yellow in color traveling from the west to the east flashed very fast across the night sky
